resources.string: Please click the 『 + 』 button on the right to add games.
You can only move forward if you agree\nto everything above
*Recommended to apply NORMAL SETTINGS first and then ADVANCED SETTINGS.
You can manage your subscription or cancel anytime in your Google account settings.

In order to provide you with the best experience, our app needs to download a required file on your device.
This will allow us to improve the app's performance and functionality.

Would you like to grant us permission to download this file?

In order to provide you with the best experience, our app needs to update to a newer version
This will allow us to improve the app's performance and functionality.

Would you like to grant us permission to update?

We value our customers and appreciate their interest in our premium files. However, we also invest a lot of time, effort and research into creating high-quality and exclusive content that meets their needs.\n\n Therefore, we charge a reasonable fee for accessing our premium files, which helps us cover our costs and continue to provide excellent service.
We have detected that you are using an Adblocker on your device. Please disable your Adblocker and restart your app to continue using it.
